CONTACT US
Kava Culture Kava Bar HQ
843 Miramar Street | Cape Coral, FL | 33904
Contact Form Demo
Submit Form

About Us
FAMILY RUN, ESTABLISHED IN 2017
Born in the heart of Southwest Florida, Kava Culture Kava Lounge was founded with one mission in mind: bring kava to the people.
Our Story
Co-founders Jacqueline and Caroline Rusher wanted to build a space where communities could connect for work and play, where respecting people, plants, and the planet is a sacred practice. A space where the thousands of years of tribal kava culture and modern community spaces can meet, mix and mingle. And thus, Kava Culture was born.
After opening their first kava lounge location in Bonita Springs, Florida, the mermaid sisters knew there was bigger potential to positively impact more communities,
In less than 4 years, Jacqueline and Caroline have opened a total of seven corporate Kava Culture locations, using only earned capital from their initial investment to drive their passion-fueled expansion.
Weâ€™re thrilled to invite you to the tribe, and honored to shared our journey to DRINK LOVE with you.
Shells up â€“ BULA!
Locations
kava lounge, mermaid sisters
CORE VALUES
PASSION FUELED
CARE ABOUT PEOPLE, PLANTS, & THE PLANET
We strive to create a welcoming space for guests to relax in our Kava Loungeâ€™s and enjoy using environmentally conscious products with consideration to our impact on the environment.
CULTIVATING GROWTH
We inspire a culture of growth both within ourselves and our communities, continually reaching to become our best selves while helping our guests to do the same.
CONNECTING COMMUNITIES
We provide an inclusive environment for making new connections, networks, and life habits. We provide an alternative environment to build friendships and better social experiences. We connect guests to our spaces, and to each other.
Come Visit us!
Or Shop Online
